item.title: Week 12 Consolidation III
item.description: Goals Do Report Back A Choice Goals for this week Pick the most impressive thing you’ve done so far in this course (any week) and do it over but explain what’s different this time. Reflect on the different between reproducing something and replicating something. How is ‘replication’ a critical feature of digital archaeology, and how does that tie into the different audiences we write for? How has your thinking evolved since the end of Module 2?
